root.name: Creatures 2
root.description: Game PlayThe launching of the Capillata, a space ship created by a lonely Shee to meet up with his people. Has unleashed a valcano, and distroyed the planet you knew and loved in the first game. In Creatures 2 you are a disembodied hand who is tasked with the job of raising Norns, a species of creature who depend on the hand for guidance. This guidance is bestowed by slapping or tickling your creatures, you must avoid danger, and explore.
